planning.notes: This is an example of a note I could have written for this project.

notes: This is yet another example of a note I could have written here

review.whatWentWell: This is where the user can describe the things that went well with this project. For example, perhaps the pattern was easier than originally thought, and the hems turned out great.
review.learned: The user can use this space to indicate what they learned, for example maybe this was their first time doing a bust adjustment or installing an invisible zipper.
review.whatToImprove: This is the space allocated to discuss any difficulties encountered. For example, maybe the fabric would have needed more stretch, or a different stitch should have been chosen.
